name: The signet ring of Torquemada
data: It increases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It has excellent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'litany'.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'will of god'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'rectitude'.
